title: Patton Gets an Aneurysm
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about a peeing device for women, miniature basketballers, stripper tear away pants and more!

Have something interesting you’d like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
